metadata.title: CVE-2024-34005 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In a shared hosting environment that has been misconfigured to allow accessto other users' content, a Moodle user with both access to restore databaseactivity modules and direct access to the web server outside of the Moodlewebroot could execute a local file include.

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
